thread.title: Connie Casciano
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 Connie Casciano

author: Connie Casciano
title: Connie Casciano
text: I ordered December 23, 2016. Have not received order. LL1612221251064552. According to tracking number BJ14824335039647 the order reached the US on January 2, 2017. I set an email to both the delivery company, sky56 and Dresslily csr svc, NO RESPONSE. Today, I am unable to to track shipment, again no response from tracking website.
